- Multi-payment support (Stripe + manual/bank transfer)

âœ… PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATIONS:
- Batch post analytics with controlled concurrency (up to 50 posts, max 5 simultaneous)
- Enhanced error handling and detailed logging across all services

- Async processing for improved response times

âœ… API ENHANCEMENTS:

- Advanced transaction search and filtering
- Subscription management APIs
